alert.note: Alert for Fleming (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 4:35AM EST until January 03 at 6:45AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following county, Fleming. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 432 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated showers and embedded thunderstorms containing very heavy rain moving across the area. Minor flooding of small streams, ditches, and culverts is expected, especially in low lying and poor drainage areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Flemingsburg, Fairview, Craintown, Elizaville, Pecks Ridge, Nepton, Tilton, Cowan, Mount Carmel, Wallingford, Foxport, Ewing and Flemingsburg Junction.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
